snippet.title: Laser Attraction - Early Access Trailer
snippet.description:
Coming to Steam Early Access on the 17th of March 2021. Wishlist now.

https://store.steampowered.com/app/1511140/Laser_Attraction/

Play with lasers and solve puzzles in Laser Attraction. Use reflection, refraction, dispersion and filtration to direct the laser beams, mix and separate colours, open doors, hit targets and complete puzzles.


Laser Attraction is an indie game developed by Vectmatica.
